Articles.Content: Any changes in the config that would allow to store saves and such in a cloud and direct the game to load from there? By extension allowing multiple computers easy access to the same files?
You can use symlinks to path a save folder to and from a Dropbox folder, or you could simply store an entire KSP installation in a Dropbox folder.
Bittorrent Sync will allow you to sync up folders between computers. I use it to sync KSP between my laptop and desktop.
Whole install in my Dropbox is the solution I use. Symlinks would be more granular, letting you choose which things to sync, but is more finicky to set up.
